summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Dial Men 3in1 Body, Hair and Face Wash, Ultimate Clean, 32 fl oz Review Date: 2019/10/27 Store: Dial Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Dial', 'Material Type Free': 'Free From Parabens,Silicones', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.41 x 3.94 x 2.68 inches; 2 Pounds', 'UPC': '017000118680'} Review Text: This doesn't feel like anything fancy. It's a value for money thing. This huge bottle is inexpensive. The pump to squeeze it out works fine. The scent is fine. And it isn't that thin watery substance with cheap brands where most of it just flows right down the drain. I use it to wash my hair.
I havent combed my hair since i was 13 and mostly just don't care about it or what I put in it. It's there and it helps keep my head warm. Whatever is in this hasn't caused my hair to fall out. So im calling that a win.
Good enough Review Title: Good enough Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Face Scrub by Disco for Men, Exfoliating and Cleansing, Removes Dead Skin and Build Up, All Natural and Paraben Free, Eucalyptus Scent, 2 Ounces Review Date: 2021/05/22 Store: Disco Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Disco', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.81 x 1.81 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001694727'} Review Text: I love being able to get in about my face with a good exfoliating wash and scrub away all the stuff. I don't know about you but I tend to wander a lot in this tiny former coal mining town where the people live and breathe in dust, and I wear it all over my face, I believe.
So scrubbing away all of that once a day feels brilliant. This isn't a harsh face wash. It's a gentle exfoliant but you can feel the grain in it while you wash your face. It's working well too. My skin isn't dried out and feels generally better than where I was using normal soap. And I like how you don't really need to use much of this to get it all over your face.
The scent was a bit of a let down because it's sort of nice but a bit weak. You might think this daft but I love a good scent that smells like a delicious candy while washing my face, or perhaps a nice lemony scent.
This is ok but it's working very well to clean my skin so no complaints really. Review Title: Pretty good Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lavender Foot Peel Mask 2 Pcs for Softing Smoothing Feet,Peeling Away Calluses and Dead Skin CellsExfoliating Foot Mask,Repair Rough Heels,Get Silky Feet Review Date: 2021/06/08 Store: BOOSCA Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BOOSCA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing,Nourish', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.24 x 0.47 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '783103348421'} Review Text: This Melao lavender exfoliant foot peel works very well. The box contains one set of booties for one time use. It’s real simple to use these. You have to start off by cleaning your feet well. It doesn’t hurt to give them a bit of a soak for a time as well beforehand. Just to get them good ready. Next, you place the booties on your feet. It’s recommended that you put socks over the booties to hold them firmly in place since you have to wear them for an hour. I did just that and think that’s a mighty fine recommendation to follow. When that hour is up, you take all that off your feet and give your feet a good washing with soap and water. Now comes the waiting game. At first, I thought they did absolutely nothing.For days, I thought they did nothing. Then, around the 4th/5th day my feet just started to peel. They were shedding skin. It was so weird! They continued to do that for a few days and when it was all over my feet did look and feel really nce for quite some time. Just remember to keep moisturizing to keep them looking and feeling nice for a long time after.

The thing about this product is that you can’t expect instant results. It takes a few days and you have to still use the same moisturizers and stuff you were using on your feet, or at least I did. I have really dry feet in spots and I despise it so to have something actually work for a little while was great. You would have to use these every so often though, I think, to keep them as nice.
At this time, when I type this, there isn’t a price listed for these so I can’t tell you if it’s worth it or not but they work well and could be. Review Title: It's good Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JODK Heatless Curling Rod Headband, No Heat Hair Curlers Ribbon with Hair Clips and Scrunchie, Soft Plush & 100% Silk Rollers for Long Hairs Sleep In, DIY Hair Styling Tools Kit for Women Girl's-Pink Review Date: 2022/01/29 Store: JODK Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Material': 'Silk, Cotton', 'Size': '8 Piece Set', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 4.84 x 2.83 inches; 7.37 Ounces'} Review Text: This is an interesting way to get some very nice curls in your hair. It’s a long soft rod type thing. The material is the usual you’d get for a curler wrapped in silk. It’s all bendy and what you do is sort of braid your hair onto/with this. After that, you use the included scrunchies to hold it in place at the bottom.

This sounds all well and good but, maybe it was just me, it was difficult to get my hair twisted correctly onto the rod. My hair is long, reaching about mid back and perfectly straight. If you get it on there right, it comes out looking very nice. It just takes a whole lot of practice. Also, as a side note, if your hair is a little damp, it works better.

This comes with the main curler, two large scrunchies, two smaller scrunchies, two hair clips, and a nice bag to keep everything in. The scrunchies are silk.

This works nicely and it’s worth trying out if you want heatless curls. For me it was difficult to get the knack of but if you are good with hair, which I am just not, you might find it quite easy from the start. Review Title: It's worth trying Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dead Sea Mud Soap,125gr, Minerals & Salt Spa Skincare for Multi Skin Disorders Natural Treatment for Face & All Body, Natural Beauty Care, All Skin types, Perfect for Oily Skin Treatment, Smooth Face & Body Within 5-10 Min Review Date: 2022/02/11 Store: MINERALS MINERALS Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Brand': 'MINERALS MINERALS', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.39 x 1.97 x 0.98 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MS-05', 'UPC': '787269003378'} Review Text: This Dead Sea mud soap is a unique one in that its composition gives you a very gentle deep cleaning, improves oxidation of the skin cells, absorbs impurities, and softens all at the same time. It works great for people with a number of skin issues including things like acne, psoriasis, dermatitis, and many others.

What I really like about this soap is how it feels once you rinse your skin off. It leaves your skin feeling incredibly clean and soft. It makes you feel like you used something that is good for you.

It’s a little pricey for one bar of soap but at the same time it does work quite well. I would recommend giving it a try if you are at all curious about it. Review Title: Deep cleaning Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Large Silk Scrunchies For Hair - Tara Sartoria Artisan Handmade Review Date: 2022/03/11 Store: Tara Sartoria Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Tara Sartoria', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.37 x 3.9 x 0.71 inches; 1.09 Ounces'} Review Text: These scrunchies are very nice. They are Tara Sartoria handmade. They are made from mulberry silk, are a nice large size, are so very easy to take care of, and feel really nice in your hair. They are washable and don't pull on your hair while wearing them or taking them out.
these come in two colors; one black and one beige. They arrive in a nice handmade black silk bag and would be incredible gift. Review Title: Excellent scrunchies Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences and Trends:**

- **Grooming Products:** A strong preference for practical and effective personal care items across various categories, including body wash, face scrubs, foot masks, and soaps. 

- **Natural Ingredients:** Consistently favors natural and paraben-free formulations, indicating a preference for products that prioritize skin health and gentle care.

- **Scent Appeal:** Enjoys pleasant scents in grooming products, though some reviews express disappointment in scent intensity, indicating a desire for more fragrant options.

- **Value for Money:** Shows a clear inclination towards value-driven purchases, often selecting large quantities or multi-use items that offer cost-effective solutions.

- **Skin Care Concerns:** Displays a concern for skin maintenance, specifically targeting issues like dryness, dead skin, and rough texture, evidenced by multiple exfoliating products in their history.

- **Practicality Over Luxury:** Prefers straightforward, functional designs over luxurious packaging, as seen in the choice of items like simple scrunchies and heatless curlers that serve basic needs.

- **Long-Term Results:** Willingness to use products that require patience for results, such as foot peel masks, reflecting a commitment to achieving lasting benefits over instant gratification.

In summary, this shopper values natural, effective, and cost-efficient personal care items, with a focus on practicality and skin health.

target_interaction.title: Works great on very long hair
target_interaction.text:
If you are looking for a hair straightener brush that really works great on long hair (past the middle of the back) this might just be for you.
I have very long hair that has terrible ends. I'm in need of a good hair cut! However, this straightener brush really made them look so much better, almost healthy! I used it with the steam feature and I don't think I've liked a straightener this much in a very long time.
I should probably mention something more about this device. This has a 30 second (to a minute) fast heating time, three different heat settings, a steam feature, an anti-scalding feature, and constant temperature protection. It also comes with a glove to protect your hand from the heat, a little water bottle thingy for the steam feature (I think), and a hair clip to use while straitening.
I really like this. Usually this type of thing takes me at minimum fifteen minutes or so. This took me about 7 to get a decent effect.
I recommend this if you are looking for a hair straightener that will give you a near salon look.
target_interaction.title_meta: [Upgrade] FUGACAL Hair Straightener Brush, 30s Fast Heating, 3 Temp Settings, Anti-Scald Design and 30mins Auto-Off, Bring You Ultra Straight Hair with Natural Shiny Look in Minutes
